summary: Gives you the ability to \"throw\" equipped daggers at your opponents with a keypress.  In reality it consumes the dagger and fires an arrow (which disappears on impact) but it is still fun and useful.
descriptionHtml:
Finally a use for those thousands of daggers you made to become a master smith!  If you equip one in your right hand, you can press \"G\" to throw it.  In reality, this consumes the dagger and fires an arrow (which disappears on impact) but it is visually convincing and fun enough that I felt I should release it.

Throwing a dagger increases your One Handed and Archery skills, and causes you to automatically equip a new one if you have more.

The throw key and skill increases can be configured by editing throwDaggers.ini.

Now you can throw any kind of dagger, although be warned -- all daggers fire the same projectile, so damage increases are minimal (if anything).

[u]-Requirements-[/u]
Requires Script Dragon, found here: http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other&altname=skyrim_script_dragon

[u]-Installation-[/u]
1. Install Script Dragon from the above link.
2. Place throwDaggers.asi and throwDaggers.ini into the skyrim/asi folder. If you don\'t have one, make one.

[u]-Uninstalling-[/u]
Delete throwDaggers.asi.

[u]-Changelog-[/u]
0.2 - added ability to throw any dagger.  Removed ability to throw daggers while in menus.  Added One-handed skill increase, and skill increase configurability.

[u]-Credit-[/u]
Thanks to Alexander Blade for Script Dragon.
author: Eldiran
